    Methods in src.main.java.gameComponents with parameters of type Board
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static boolean
    Check.isInsideBoard(Board board, int xPos, int yPos)
    Checks if the specified position is inside the standard 5x5 board.
    static boolean
    Check.isValidConstruction(Board board, int fxPos, int fyPos)
    Checks if a construction on [fxPos, fyPos] is valid (not a dome).
    static boolean
    Check.isValidMovement(Board board, int sxPos, int syPos, int fxPos, int fyPos)
    Checks if a movement from start to final positions is valid, considering the presence of a dome or another worker and the height difference.
    static boolean
    Check.isWorkerPresent(Board board, int xPos, int yPos)
    Checks if the Worker is present in the cell.
    static boolean
    Check.PossibleMovement(Board board, int[][] workers)
    Checks if any of the two workers of the current player can move.
    static boolean
    Check.WinCondition(Board board, int xPos, int yPos)
    Checks if a Worker at [xPos, yPos] is on a tower of height 3 (winning condition).
    Constructors in src.main.java.gameComponents with parameters of type Board
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    GameController(Board board)
    Constructs a GameController with a given board, sets the initial GameState to STARTING, and randomly picks which player (RED or BLUE) goes first.
